The Message class represents a message exchanged between the client and the server.

Represents a player in the game.
PointsParameter
Represents an interface for defining the parameter to get the points associated with a gold card.

Represents a deck of resource cards used in the game.

Represents a resource objective card.

The RMIServer class implements an RMI server for handling remote client connections.

TCPClient
 
TCPServer
The TCPServer class implements a TCP server for handling client connections.
